mstdio.h(7) Miscellaneous Information Manual mstdio.h(7)

NAME

mjo_read, mjo_read_line — stream read routines

LIBRARY

library “libmjo”

SYNOPSIS

#include <mstdio.h>

enum mjo_status {

mjo_status_ok
mjo_status_error
mjo_status_eof
mjo_status_truncated
};


typedef ptrdiff_t mjo_handle_t;
typedef ssize_t;


int
(*mjo_read_t)(mjo_handle_t, void*, size_t);


int
mjo_read(enum mjo_status*const, size_t*const, void*, size_t const, mjo_read_t const, mjo_handle_t);

INCLUDES

<stdio.h> and/or <io.h>
<mstddef.h>

DESCRIPTION

Provides routines to read from an abstract stream and object handle.

mjo_status_ok indicator that the operation completed successfully
mjo_status_error indicator that the operation failed
mjo_status_eof indicator that the end of file has been reached
mjo_status_truncated indicator that data has been truncated

SEE ALSO

read(2) / mjo_read(3)

July 22, 2020 OpenBSD 7.0
